wikipedia_page.main: Henry Forster (born c. 1883) was an English footballer who played for Sunderland as a defender. He made his debut for Sunderland against Sheffield United on 9 February 1907 in a 3–2 defeat at Bramall Lane. In total, Forster made 103 appearances for Sunderland without scoring.

response: Henry Forster, 1st Baron Forster (1866–1936) was a British politician in Australia.
Henry Forster may also refer to:
*Henry Forster (MP for Leicester) fl.1414-1421, MP for Leicester (UK Parliament constituency)
